sql.name: 修改项目
sql.content: UPDATE t_project SET project_name=':projectName',project_number=':projectNumber', contract_number=':contractNumber', project_desc=':projectDesc', project_manager=':projectManager', allow_box_num=:allowBoxNum WHERE id = ':projectId'

sql.name: 获取项目列表
sql.content: SELECT p.id, p.project_name, p.project_number, p.contract_number, p.project_desc, p.project_manager as user_id, p.status, p.allow_box_num, p.create_date, u.user_name as project_manager FROM t_project p LEFT JOIN t_user u ON p.project_manager = u.id WHERE 1=1 [ AND instr(project_name,':projectName') > 0 ] ORDER BY create_date DESC

sql.name: 根据ID获取项目
sql.content: SELECT p.id, p.project_name, p.project_number, p.contract_number, p.project_desc, p.project_manager as user_id, p.status, p.allow_box_num, p.create_date, u.user_name as project_manager FROM t_project p LEFT JOIN t_user u ON p.project_manager = u.id WHERE p.id = ':projectId'

sql.name: 检查项目名是否存在
sql.content: SELECT COUNT(*) as countNum FROM t_project WHERE id != ':projectId' AND project_name = ':projectName'

sql.name: 获取项目经理相关的项目
sql.content: SELECT id,project_name FROM t_project WHERE project_manager = ':userId' AND status = 'I'

sql.name: 获取施工经理相关的项目
sql.content: SELECT id,project_name FROM t_project WHERE id IN (SELECT project_id FROM t_project_personnel WHERE user_id = ':userId') AND status = 'I'

sql.name: 添加项目施工经理
sql.content: INSERT INTO t_project_personnel(id, project_id, user_id, duty, allow_box_num) values(':id',':projectId',':userId',':duty',':allowBoxNum')

sql.name: 删除机箱提交的记录
sql.content: DELETE FROM t_machine_box_submit where machine_box_id IN ( SELECT id FROM t_machine_box WHERE project_id =':projectId' AND build_manager = ':userId' )

sql.name: 删除项目施工经理创建的机箱
sql.content: DELETE FROM t_machine_box WHERE project_id =':projectId' AND build_manager = ':userId'

sql.name: 删除项目施工经理
sql.content: DELETE FROM t_project_personnel WHERE project_id =':projectId' AND user_id = ':userId'

sql.name: 获取项目人员列表
sql.content: SELECT pp.id, pp.project_id, pp.user_id, pp.duty, pp.allow_box_num, u.full_name, u.contact_number,o.org_name, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.project_id = pp.project_id AND b.build_manager = pp.user_id AND b.pm_confirm_date=null AND exists (SELECT machine_box_id FROM t_machine_box_submit bs WHERE bs.machine_box_id = b.id ) ) as submit_box_num, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.project_id = pp.project_id AND b.build_manager = pp.user_id AND b.pm_confirm_date!=null AND exists (SELECT machine_box_id FROM t_machine_box_submit bs WHERE bs.machine_box_id = b.id ) ) as accept_box_num FROM t_project_personnel pp LEFT JOIN t_user u ON pp.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_org o ON u.org_id = o.id WHERE pp.project_id = ':projectId'

sql.name: 获取施工经理提交机箱的验收数
sql.content: SELECT COUNT(*) AS countNum FROM t_machine_box b WHERE b.project_id = ':projectId' AND b.build_manager = ':userId' AND b.pm_confirm_date!=null AND exists (SELECT machine_box_id FROM t_machine_box_submit bs WHERE bs.machine_box_id = b.id )

sql.name: 获取项目已分配完的机箱数
sql.content: SELECT sum(allow_box_num) AS allot_box_num FROM t_project_personnel WHERE project_id = ':projectId'

sql.name: 获取项目项目经理当前项目下的机箱
sql.content: SELECT b.id, b.box_number, b.create_date, b.longitude, b.latitude, b.pos_desc, b.processor_num, b.build_manager,b.project_id,u.user_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_machine_box_submit t1 where machine_box_id = b.id ) AS submit_num, (SELECT max(submit_date) FROM t_machine_box_submit t0 where machine_box_id = b.id ) AS new_submit_date, pm_confirm_date FROM t_machine_box b LEFT JOIN t_user u ON b.build_manager = u.id WHERE b.project_id = ':projectId' [ AND instr(b.box_number,':boxNumber') > 0 ]
